attributes.action: Improve bus services in stoke on Trent more buses in evenings and late nights.
attributes.additional_details: Not enough buses they don’t show up on time or at all

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for local bus operators and the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
